artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Hayashiya Shōgorō; Carved by Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
marks: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Kotoba no hana momiji no yozakari 詞花紅成盛, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1849, 8th month.
title: The Actors Nakamura Utaemon IV as Honjōmaru Tsunagorō (R) and Bandō Shuka I as Ofusa's younger sister Koito (L)
